pluginstrument.author: Simstrumentation
pluginstrument.description:
Made by SIMSTRUMENTATION "EXTERMINATE THE MICE FROM YOUR COCKPIT!" GitHub: https://simstrumentation.com
Main switch panel for the Cessna 172 G1000 Edition
RELEASES: V1.02 - Released 2022-07-19 - adjusted spacing of toggle switches - made master battery, alternator and avionics switches wider for easier use
V1.01 - Released 2022-07-17 - adjusted grapphical issues - knob graphics - still inop - adjusted state issue with pitot switch
V1.0 - Released 2022-07-16
NOTES: - Background graphic by Andrew Kena from the MSFS forum and modified by Crunchmeister / Otto Pilot
KNOWN ISSUES: - Light potentiometers currently INOP. Will come in a future version
